resources.string:
Use your bluetooth device to select which app you want to use to play music!

Simply hit next, previous, or play on your bluetooth device. Media router will pop up and ask you what application you want to handle the action. You can select using your phone OR or you can navigate through the list using the next and previous buttons on your bluetooth device. Android Media Router will speak what is currently selected. When you find the app you want, simply hit play to foward the action to that application.

If music is already playing, Media Button Router stays out of the way, and lets whatever app is playing music handle pauses, previous, and next.

You must enable whatever handle headset preference your music apps have.

NOTE: There will be some apps that this will just not work well with. Try finding replacements if you want to use this application.

If you are a developer, please feel free to contribute :)
